H0.text: Light reactions are the first stage of photosynthesis.

H1.text: Consumption is the name of the first stage of photosynthesis.

H2.text: Absorption is the name of the first stage of photosynthesis.

H3.text: Contamination is the name of the first stage of photosynthesis.

A4.text: Light-dependent reactions are the chemical reactions involved in photosynthesis induced by light
